channel.title: Devolution Weapon Timer's...Needed!
channel.description:
Umm..Well this is my first time asking, I need help on my Devolution project.
I have Food Timer's from 2007, and I thought that would work as a base, but it didn't... I was thinking if anybody has made a Weapon Timer for Devolution in a handled case.
I want to use a handler to control it, I need a Special's and Weapon timer's for it, any tut's or answer's? Please.

item.title: Devolution Weapon Timer's...Needed!
item.dc:creator: @_kidz `kidz
item.description:
@_kidz wrote:

True, I can use that, and it work’s, but what do I declare and should I create a int or void for the Weapons?

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Weapon Timer's...Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

java.util.Timer and java.util.TimerTask, or you can create your own if you learn how threading works.

Read full topic
